title: The Ultimate Paleo Chocolate Chip Cookies
directions: Cream together almond butter, egg, and vanilla extract together until smooth.
Stir in coconut sugar and baking powder until well mixed and add the chocolate chips.
Shape into 1-1 ½ inch balls and place on a baking sheet. using your palm gently flatten a bit, so that they spread a bit better.
Bake for 12-15 minutes until golden brown.
ingredients: 1 cup almond butter (or peanut butter or cashew butter)
